comment.author: 30356958@N00
comment._content: This is fabulous, I just finished a paper on the 1916 election and the Catts campaign for a Florida Studies class at USF St. Pete.. So cool to see what I have been reading about. If anyone happens to know where I can get the locations of the places where he actually campaigned (the rural areas where he drove the Model T and sported the guns), please let me know!!! Thanks so much for posting this video.

comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: Thanks for visiting the Florida Memory photostream, somesmokingmonkeys!
